body: CI fails because of previous master failure.
only comment change, CI failed because of previous master failure.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12370508/86867935-4cc27b80-c106-11ea-9ce7-416882bc0a3e.png)
在这里应该使用decoratedDefinition来进行暴露问题，如果你快速定制dubbo，你可以参考https://github.com/open-wrapper/dubbo-wrapper
这bug超级久了，就是 不修，我也是醉了。 不是有专门spring生态的团队么
我觉得在`setAddress`方法中进行判空处理比控制`propertyValues`顺序要来的方便，你可以提个PR修复这个问题。
Thanks for your commit, however, it was duplicated.
Duplicated

> Thanks for your commit, however, it was duplicated.

I saw the solution before mine,but it will only work within tomcat 8.x under, in tomcat 9,the function addServletMapping is deleted ,so it wont runnable in tomcat9

Because it happens randomly,  there is no problem on retrying with the same parameters and the same return data. 

Thrift is called by dubbo, there is not direct usage of thrift on my program, only some configuration.

It seems that native-thrift is unstable on production mode.   Besides the exception below, there will oom and oom on direct memory occasionally. 


Are there any usage on production mode?

直接升级太危险了，你可以参考我司的升级方案
https://github.com/open-wrapper/dubbo-wrapper

升级是很危险的操作，可以参考我司
https://github.com/open-wrapper/dubbo-wrapper

你想要去掉，又想极为简单跟踪社区源码，可以参考
https://github.com/open-wrapper/dubbo-wrapper
你这是提前初始化了，导致占位符没有被替换
dubbo的兼容包是没有经过生产环境检验的，事实上我们做了很多补全才完成了升级。你可以参考https://github.com/open-wrapper/dubbo-wrapper
可以，你可以私聊我
这和zkserver和你的curator版本有关系，确定来说，使用curator更容易遭受这个问题。zkclient安全性更高，可惜已经被dubbo移除了

> Not ADD @SPI annotation

I've added @SPI to alibaba.ExtensionFactory in #6436

> BTW, ExtensionLoader not provided compatible class.

Why do we need a compatible ExtensionLoader, could you please further explain?
遇到的同样的问题！麻烦在新的版本修复下
We used dubbo 2.7.3, and the same isssue appears. I have searched the Releases, but found nothing.
I see this problem too. Who can give me an example?
让我告诉为什么，某次commiter为了简单解决问题，在某一次改动中改了，详情见[#5908](https://github.com/apache/dubbo/issues/5908#event-3263222590)
原来如此.感谢

> 消费方传输的参数中一旦包含有数组字段，且数组中包含 null元素，服务提供方会抛NullPointerException

我们遇到了同样的问题。同样是数组中有null元素。

希望下一版本可以修复这个bug。老版本的功能是正常的，不然不好升级，不知道怎么提pr？

`<dubbo:parameter` is parameter configuration.
You can use `RpcContext.getContext().setAttachment("index", "1")` to implicitly pass parameters:
http://dubbo.apache.org/en-us/docs/user/demos/attachment.html

I'd like to help, but, how can I help?
I have tested to merge the code from those sample to 2.7.7, and it works.  BTW, the original code has some bugs, need to fix.
it is very clear. The ```totalWeight != weight * (i + 1)``` is very clever. very nice

A distributedly Locking issue.
Another issue: `locks.remove(key)` should be put into a `finally` block to guarantee that the url key is removed when exception happens.

Is there a real result that decrement submittedTaskCount more than once? I guess it will not happen. because execute(or called submit) and runWorker(or means run) are two phases. When the task failed to submit, I would not be run.
这么多天了，没有人回答。。。org.apache.dubbo.monitor.MonitorService这个类是在dubbo-monitor-api模块下面，但是这个模块下没有生成打包后的文件，真愁

> A distributedly Locking issue.
> Another issue: `locks.remove(key)` should be put into a `finally` block to guarantee that the url key is removed when exception happens.

+ A distributed lock? Sorry, I don't get it. The variable `locks` is just a member of `DubboProtocol` instance  and only used in this method.
+ Another issue you said  is  perfectly right.
I think @mengle-yang is right
please see to #6497

How about providing a filter to set tag attachment at same time ?
I think we will invoke not only one service but the attachments will be cleared after invoking provider every time

我这边也出现这个问题了，打包之后在服务器上跑起来基本是必现的，我debug跟踪了一下，发现是org.apache.dubbo.common.extension.ExtensionLoader中的findClassLoader 获取的classLoader getResources为空，使用ExtensionLoader.class.getClassLoader() 获得的classLoader是可以获取资源的，麻烦阿里的同学看下是不是ClassUtils.getClassLoader(ExtensionLoader.class)的问题？@Leishunyu
So sad to use 2.6.X

spring-mvc: `5.2.7`

i import jetty-servlet but still get this error  

#### provider  

```yml  
server:
  port: 8080
  servlet:
    jsp:
      class-name: org.apache.dubbo.remoting.http.servlet.DispatcherServlet

#dubbo configuration
#
# scan base package
dubbo:
  scan:
    base-packages: com.yjcloud.material.collection.server.service
  protocols:
    dubbo:
      name: dubbo
      port: -1 # -1 
      payload: 11557050
      server: netty
      accepts: 1000
    hessian:
      name: hessian
      port: -1
      server: jetty # servlet
  application:
    qos-enable: false
  registry:
    address: spring-cloud://localhost
    group: collection-server
  provider:
    version: 1.0.0
    delay: -1
    timeout: 6000
    loadbalance: leastactive
    connections: 3  
```  
```java  
@Service(protocol = "hessian")
public class FooImpl implements FooService {
    @Override
    public String say(byte[] bytes) {
        return String.format("hello %s", bytes.length);
    }
}
```  
#### consumer  

```yml
dubbo:
  registry:
    address: spring-cloud://localhost
  cloud:
    subscribed-services: ${provider.application.name}
  consumer:
    check: false
    version: 1.0.0
  application:
    qos-enable: false

server:
  port: 8082

provider:
  application:
    name: material-collection-server  
```    

```java  
@RestController
    public class BarController {

        @Reference(protocol = "hessian")

        @GetMapping("/say")

            File file = new File("/Users/myou/Downloads/apache-maven-3.5.4.zip");
            byte[] bytes = new byte[(int) file.length()];
            try {
                FileInputStream fileInputStream = new FileInputStream(file);
                fileInputStream.read(bytes);
                fileInputStream.close();
            } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            String say = FooImpl.say(bytes);
            return say;
        }
    }
```

这个是正常的现象吧 目前来说服务端还不能感知到 客户端的超时
而且服务端的超时完全要依赖于你的业务下游 比如你查询db耗时等等 这个在consumer即使设置也是无用的。
你这种情况可以考虑设置provider的一些调优参数（比如tpsFilter）快速失败才是正确的做法

provider:

同样遇到这个问题,想问一下是bug还是有意为之。

It depends. Precondition: redis-server auth enabled. ```xml ``` The bad one throws: ``` redis.clients.jedis.exceptions.JedisDataException: NOAUTH Authentication required. at redis.clients.jedis.Protocol.processError(Protocol.java:127) at redis.clients.jedis.Protocol.process(Protocol.java:161) at redis.clients.jedis.Protocol.read(Protocol.java:215) at redis.clients.jedis.Connection.readProtocolWithCheckingBroken(Connection.java:340) at redis.clients.jedis.Connection.getStatusCodeReply(Connection.java:239) at redis.clients.jedis.Jedis.set(Jedis.java:121) ... ``` It seems [`MetadataReportConfig#toUrl`](https://github.com/apache/dubbo/blob/043da6850b81dd03d5879b19f1c2a52b05426272/dubbo-common/src/main/java/org/apache/dubbo/config/MetadataReportConfig.java#L89-L108) didn't set the username&password to the proper field of the url. Therefore the constructor of [`RedisMetadataReport`](https://github.com/apache/dubbo/blob/043da6850b81dd03d5879b19f1c2a52b05426272/dubbo-metadata/dubbo-metadata-report-redis/src/main/java/org/apache/dubbo/metadata/store/redis/RedisMetadataReport.java#L64-L77) gets no password with `url.getPassword()`, which hides in `url.getParameter("password")`. Replace implementation of [`MetadataReportConfig#toUrl`](https://github.com/apache/dubbo/blob/043da6850b81dd03d5879b19f1c2a52b05426272/dubbo-common/src/main/java/org/apache/dubbo/config/MetadataReportConfig.java#L89-L108) with method `UrlUtils.parseURL(address, map)` from same situation in [`ConfigCenterConfig#toUrl`](https://github.com/apache/dubbo/blob/043da6850b81dd03d5879b19f1c2a52b05426272/dubbo-common/src/main/java/org/apache/dubbo/config/ConfigCenterConfig.java#L94-L106) should resolve this problem. https://github.com/apache/dubbo/blob/043da6850b81dd03d5879b19f1c2a52b05426272/dubbo-common/src/main/java/org/apache/dubbo/config/MetadataReportConfig.java#L89-L108 https://github.com/apache/dubbo/blob/043da6850b81dd03d5879b19f1c2a52b05426272/dubbo-metadata/dubbo-metadata-report-redis/src/main/java/org/apache/dubbo/metadata/store/redis/RedisMetadataReport.java#L64-L77
I will add a redis client module to handle the interact with redis server, meanwhile solve the problem
